test_purpose: Asymmetric TSP - Real-world one-way streets and traffic simulation
validation_notes: Distance matrix must be asymmetric: d[i][j] ≠ d[j][i]
Algorithms should handle asymmetric matrices correctly
Simulates real HCMC traffic: one-way streets, bridge tolls, highway lanes
notes: Tests algorithm robustness with asymmetric distance matrix - Models real urban traffic patterns in Ho Chi Minh City
